message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
Let's be fair and split it evenly.  This way, we both get the maximum possible value before inflation takes its bite.
I'll take a bit less than before, but still more than half
I'm willing to compromise a little, but I think a 48/52 split is a fairer reflection of the current inflation rates.  Let's get this deal done before we lose even more money!
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, let's settle this
